case.title: looking for a nice honnest woman - 37 (jersey city) - 37 (jersey city)
case.text:
I am nice good heart man never smoke,never drank at my life looking for a nice good heart woman for long term relationship or short term relation ship I like any woman who is honnest respect her partner likes him and love him for his personality not to a profit him...race,age and relegion never be a matter for me ...what its matter to me is the heart and the mine... please i am not interest at the model girl thats is works as lingery model at the inter net ..... and i will not respond them..becuase i do not care about their beauty I am interest only for a real normal woman ( value women quality women)
thank you every one
